title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A witty and romantic tale of love, class, and misunderstandings between Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.
appreciation: My favorite book of all time. I love the characters (especially Mr Darcy), the setting, and the plot(a really good enemies to lover) . It's a timeless classic that never fails to captivate me.

title: Love hypothesis
description: A fake-dating romance between a PhD student and a grumpy professor that turns into something real
appreciation: I love the characters, the plot, and the writing style. Adam Carlsen was so well written and the scientific environment was perfectly described. It's a really good enemies to lovers romance novel.

title: Livre des coincidences
description: A reflective exploration of synchronicities and how meaningful coincidences shape our lives.
appreciation: One of my favorite spiritual book. I love how there's no real coincidences in life and how everything is connected. We have the power to change our life and the universe is always listening.

title: overwatch 2
description: A fast-paced, team-based shooter with diverse heroes, strategic gameplay, and evolving storylines.
appreciation: My favorite game. I play it everyday, I grinded to Master which is only 1% of the player base. Ana is my favorite character, I love her design and her gameplay.

title: Non designers design book
description: A practical guide to understanding design principles like contrast, alignment, repetition, and proximity.
appreciation: Pretty interesting concepts from an experienced designer. I learned a lot about design and how to make things look good. I recommend it to anyone who wants to learn more about design.

title: fourth wing
description: A thrilling fantasy about a young woman forced into a deadly dragon-riding academy where survival is everything
appreciation: This is my favorite fantasy book (really good ,if not my best, discovery of 2024). very well written with a lot of plot twists and an interesting universe.

title: it takes two
description: A cooperative adventure game where a divorcing couple navigates a magical world to rebuild their relationship
appreciation: This is my favorite fantasy book (really good ,if not my best, discovery of 2024). very well written with a lot of plot twists and an interesting universe.
